properties.name: Road Signs
properties.description: Nonsense road signs made to look like official road signs, placed here and throughout the burn. Be on the look out!Funded Arthttp://www.euphoriaburn.com/content/art-blog]]>

properties.name: The Octoplatform
properties.description: The Octoplatform is, in short, a platform covered in tentacles. It's made to be a nesting spot for people to relax in, while being temporarily secluded from the burn itself, thanks to the tentacles. Funded Arthttp://www.euphoriaburn.com/content/art-blog]]>

properties.name: Burning Picket Fences
properties.description: Throughout the burn participants will create protest signs and make a fence out of them. Towards the end we'll march through the camp with our protest signs, singing our various slogans in an energetic display of chaotic dissent. Then we burn 'em!Funded Arthttp://www.euphoriaburn.com/content/art-blog]]>

properties.name: Hammock City!
properties.description: A tiny village of hammocks and art set deep (or not so deep) in the Hinterlands, where burners can come to relax, make art, do yoga, and connect with nature and each other.Funded Arthttp://www.euphoriaburn.com/content/art-blog]]>

properties.name: Infinite Video
properties.description: This will be a twist on my previous projects, instead of LEDs lighting the inside of infinite mirror. I will be using computer monitors with 3D animations reflecting infinitely. The plan is to split a video signal between 5 to 8 computer monitors arranged in polygonal form with one way mirrors capping it off creating the infinite effect making a video tunnel. I am hoping to use this as the ceiling of The Infinite Us. It will also work as a stand alone video portal.Funded Arthttp://www.euphoriaburn.com/content/art-blog]]>

properties.name: Alternative Synergy Kite Farm
properties.description: Come fly with us at the Alternative Synergy Kite Farm! Our take on the Topsy-Turvy Laboratory theme is to turn Euphoria's world upside-down and take burners' fun to the sky with a collection of easy-to-fly, sea-themed single line kites!Funded Arthttp://www.euphoriaburn.com/content/art-blog]]>

properties.name: Yum Yum Delivery Service
properties.description: We will coordinate with camps that any camps cooking (primarily large) meals and with the help of volunteers deliver food to hungry hippies across the burn.Funded Arthttp://www.euphoriaburn.com/content/art-blog]]>

properties.name: Recycled Life
properties.description: The project will be in two stages. On Thursday, there will be a large egg with symbols on it. At night the egg will have an ember like glow to it. The next day a wooden phoenix will be quickly constructed from pieces from within the egg. There will be markers, crayons, and paint for people to draw, write, paint on the phoenix. It will be set on fire at sunset on Friday.Funded Arthttp://www.euphoriaburn.com/content/art-blog]]>

properties.name: Puzzle Quest Returns
properties.description: A large puzzle whose pieces will be hidden throughout the burn and eventually the participants will gather and put them together. Funded Arthttp://www.euphoriaburn.com/content/art-blog]]>

properties.name: Stagger Sticks
properties.description: Participants make their own walking stick with wraps and decoratives we supply.Funded Arthttp://www.euphoriaburn.com/content/art-blog]]>

properties.name: Spindozer Glitterbomb
properties.description: Let there be... GLITTER JARS! What's a glitter jar, you ask? Why, it's a lava lamp, which requires no electricity, and is made of GLITTER!!! Watch a rainbow of glitter spin on the SPINDOZER GLITTERBOMB. This Ferris wheel-like contraption holds 8 "jars" (plastic!), each at an slight angle. At this angle, as the wheel turns, each jar is flipped over, sending glitter globules oozing and tumbling to the bottom. As the glitter does this, bright light shines through the jars and the glitter, creating a dazzling effect! Brilliant! (Literally!) The SPINDOZER GLITTERBOMB can also be spun quickly, fully agitating the GLITTER RAINBOW. Lie beneath the wheel on our water resistant camping blanket and gaze upon the colors of the glitter as they are altered by turbulent forces! SCIENCE! ART! SCART!Funded Arthttp://www.euphoriaburn.com/content/art-blog]]>

properties.name: 3 Old Men Labyrinth
properties.description: 3 Old Men is an installation of an octagonal, multicursal labyrinth. Burners are invited to enter the labyrinth for meditation. At three of the four exits, an officiant (Old Man) offers an agon/experience. Project details can be found at:http://goo.gl/C9jJDD]]>

properties.name: Castle Do It Less Shitty
properties.description: We're bringing back the castle from Alchemy 2015! We're adding a bar/serving window this year. We are adding walls and improving the upper deck. We may have flame effects, but it will depend on what we can get together prior to the event.]]>

properties.name: Sparkle Pony Express
properties.description: Want to send a letter, parcel, gift, or singing telegram to a fellow Euphoria participant? Leave it the Sparkle Pony Express, your friendly neighborhood bicycle couriers! Simply bring your message to the Sparkle Pony Express drop box located the Art Hub (or Connexus). Fill out a Delivery Instructions form (found in the binder at the drop box), attach it to your message or parcel (if any) and place it in the drop box. Our couriers will periodically check the drop box and make sure your message or parcel reaches its destination. Alternatively, you can flag down a rainbow-cycling-cap-donning bicycle courier who will happily accept your item and deliver it straightaway. Won't be attending the burn or want to set up your delivery ahead of time? No problem! Navigate to https://goo.gl/8NbvcP and fill out the web form! Have a physical parcel for us to deliver? Interested in becoming a courier? Email us at SparklePonyExpressGA@gmail.com!http://www.alchemyfestival.com/art/blog/smoothie-pony-express]]>

properties.name: Burn Battle Bots
properties.description: Zorb ball painted to look like bender and gir, put in an enclosed netted area where burners can have it put if you will in the zorb balls fun for all ages.http://alchemyburn.com/art/funded-projects/alchemy-2015-funded-project-burn-battle-bots]]>

properties.name: Odey the Singing Monster
properties.description: A monster with a gong in his mouth.http://alchemyburn.com/art/blog/odey-singing-monster]]>

properties.name: The Sex Gong
properties.description: See, hear, experience a sex act? Bang the gong. http://alchemyburn.com/content/funded-artist-blog-post-10-giggity-sex-gong]]>

properties.name: The Music Post
properties.description: Posts of various DIY instruments for kids (of all ages) to play. Such as a post of pots, pans, drumsticks.]]>

properties.name: The Friction lab
properties.description: A large, slick , smooth floor for all your floor sliding needs. every time you were told not to sock skate, now you can! bring your slippiest socks for best results!]]>

properties.name: The Black Lodge
properties.description: The Black Lodge returns to Euphoria to continue our Twin Peaks theme with a smaller recreation of David Lynch's Red Room; a karaoke stage.After Alchemud spelled the demise of our previous Room, we've decided to go a little minimalist and recreate a small part of the Room as a stage. We'll be running scheduled karaoke events throughout the burn, and some impromptu jam sessions as well. If you hear us singing badly, you'll know the Room is open.http://alchemyburn.com/art/blog/cross-pollination-art-projects]]>

properties.name: Memento Moebius Minimus
properties.description: A minimal mustering of Memento Moebius aims to provide earthlings and extraterrestrials alike with the chance to experience our 8-foot extraplanetary space crystal. This year we have persuaded it to truly sing upon your contact. The crystal can assist you on your journey; with your cooperation it can open the folded, old creases of your mind and inject life in them as only foreign space crystals can. We will provide you with the crystal's aura, some casual dance music, some delicious plant food, and general peace or airhorn chaos depending on the crystal's desires. Trust no one except the crystal and the learnings you gain from it. Stay curious & wander well.http://alchemyburn.com/art/funded-projects/alchemy-2015-funded-project-moebius-crystal]]>

properties.name: Infinite Us
properties.description: A 5 sided one way mirror gazebo.http://alchemyburn.com/art/blog/infinite-us]]>

properties.name: Infinte Preformance Platform
properties.description: A small stage.http://art.alchemyburn.com/infinite-mirror-performance-platform]]>
